content.name: Sun Breathing
content.description: Breathing Style only known and taught by the Kamado Family, later revealed to be the first Breathing Style

combat_style_character.name: Tanjiro Kamado
combat_style_character.description: Is the main protagonist of Demon Slayer. He joined the Demon Slayer Corp to find a remedy to turn his sister, Nezuko Kamado, back into a human and to hunt down and kill demons.

combat_style_character.name: Yoriichi
combat_style_character.description: He is a Demon Slayer who lived nearly 500 years ago during the Sengoku era. He was the most powerful Demon Slayer to have ever existed.

content.name: Water Breathing
content.description: Water Breathing is one of the five main Breathing Styles directly derived from Sun Breathing.

combat_style_character.name: Tanjiro Kamado
combat_style_character.description: Is the main protagonist of Demon Slayer. He joined the Demon Slayer Corp to find a remedy to turn his sister, Nezuko Kamado, back into a human and to hunt down and kill demons.

combat_style_character.name: Giyu Tomioka
combat_style_character.description: He is a Demon Slayer of the Demon Slayer Corps and the current Water Hashira. He has a reserved personality and a very strong sense of justice.

combat_style_character.name: Sakonji Urokodaki
combat_style_character.description: Sakonji Urokodaki is a retired member of the Demon Slayer Corps, having held the position of the previous Water Hashira. He is the main cultivator of the Water Breathing style, having trained Makomo, Sabito, Giyu Tomioka, and Tanjiro Kamado.

combat_style_character.name: Sabito
combat_style_character.description: Sabito was a former apprentice of Sakonji Urokodaki. He appeared to assist Tanjiro Kamado in his preparations for the Final Selection exam.

combat_style_character.name: Makomo
combat_style_character.description: Makomo and Sabito were both orphaned from their respective families and adopted by Sakonji, who trained them both and permitted them to attend the Demon Slayer Corps´Final Selection.

combat_style_character.name: Aoi Kanzaki
combat_style_character.description: Aoi Kanzaki is a Demon Slayer of the Demon Slayer Corps. However, she works as a helper at the Butterfly Mansion, rather than taking to the front lines and fighting demons.

combat_style_character.name: Murata
combat_style_character.description: Not much is known about Murata, however, he does not like it when a hunter of lower rank chastises him. He is somewhat timid, however he does seem braver than most.

content.name: Combustible Blood
content.description: Nezuko´s Blood Demon Art allows her to combust her blood into pink-colored flames at will. Her flames have a special property which makes them exclusively harmful to demons.

combat_style_character.name: Nezuko Kamado
combat_style_character.description: She is a demon and the younger sister of Tanjiro Kamado and one of the two remaining members of the Kamado family. Formerly a human, she was attacked and transformed into a demon by Muzan Kibutsuji.

content.name: Thunder Breathing
content.description: Thunder Breathing is a Breathing Style that mimics lightning, specifically swift strikes and movements akin to lightning ripping through the sky, and replicates it with the user´s movements, techniques and abilities.

combat_style_character.name: Zenitsu Agatsuma
combat_style_character.description: Zenitsu Agatsuma is one of the main characters of Demon Slayer and along with Inosuke Hashibira, a travelling companion of Tanjiro Kamado and Nezuko Kamado. He is also a Demon Slayer in the Demon Slayer Corps.

content.name: Flesh Manipulation
content.description: Flesh Manipulation is a supernatural ability possessed by demons that allow them to alter and control their own flesh and body.

combat_style_character.name: Hand Demon
combat_style_character.description: The Hand Demon was the primary antagonist of the Final Selection Arc of Demon Slayer. He was a notorious demon who killed thirteen of Sakonji Urokodaki´s apprentices
